ModMetaData.name: [MS-I] Brain surgery
ModMetaData.author: Arystique, Stickie, Xynthinel
ModMetaData.description:
Ever get the feeling your prisoners are causing too much trouble?
MS-Industries is here to provide a solution: Brain surgery! Keep your prisoners in check by directly manipulating their cranium using state of the art tools. Based on previous work by Arystique -Lobotomy-, we fixed the mod for (B19 / 1.0) and added the possibility to immobilize prisoners for potential harvesting.
Have fun with it!
